base_description: Small, silver scissors with a sleek design.
part_description: Two sharp blades, two handles with circular grips, joined by a central pivot. Blades are elongated and pointed, handles are rounded.
internal_interaction_description: The blades pivot around a central screw, allowing them to open and close in a scissor-like motion. The handles provide leverage to move the blades, enabling cutting action when pressed together.
external_interaction_description: Used to cut paper, fabric, or other materials by applying pressure on the handles. Requires manual operation by a user, typically held in one hand, aligning the blades with the material to be cut.
